full_text:
Page 1090
Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76318-059 Date: 07.23.19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
8:37am Inmate Epstein is pajamaed (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:45am Inmate Epstein is sitting at the edge of his bunk motionless. I made sure he was breathing.
* 8:59am Inmate Epstein says he feels his therapist won't let him drink water.
9:00am Inmate Epstein is pajamaed, looking out the window.
9:10am (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) I noticed Inmate Epstein is still speaking with L.S.O.
9:15am (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:30am Inmate Epstein Inmate Epstein is sitting on the edge of his bed.
9:29am Inmate Epstein asked for the time.
9:45am Inmate Epstein is sitting on the edge of his bed.
10:00 Inmate Epstein asked to speak with his attorney. Inmate Epstein is using the bathroom.
11:15am Inmate Epstein is speaking with the Officer about his attorney.
11:16am Inmate Epstein mentioned to be said his attorney is not here yet (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
* 10:30am Inmate Epstein is drinking water
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.
2
DOJ-OGR-00025312
